name: EpochManager
description: EpochManager contract. Produce epochs based on a number of blocks to coordinate contracts in the protocol.

eventDecorators.name: EpochLengthUpdate
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw process was finalized. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: EpochRun
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw process was finalized. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: ParameterUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw process was finalized. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: SetController
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw process was finalized. Triggers on new deposit call.

functionDecorators.name: acceptProxy
functionDecorators.description: Accept to be an implementation of proxy.

functionDecorators.name: acceptProxyAndCall
functionDecorators.description: Accept to be an implementation of proxy and then call a function from the new implementation as specified by `_data`, which should be an encoded function call. This is useful to initialize new storage variables in the proxied contract.

functionDecorators.name: currentEpoch
functionDecorators.description: Return the current epoch, it may have not been run yet.

returnDecorators.description: The current epoch based on epoch length.

functionDecorators.name: currentEpochBlock
functionDecorators.description: Return block where the current epoch started.

returnDecorators.description: The block number when the current epoch started.

functionDecorators.name: currentEpochBlockSinceStart
functionDecorators.description: Return the number of blocks that passed since current epoch started.

returnDecorators.description: Blocks that passed since start of epoch.

functionDecorators.name: epochsSince
functionDecorators.description: Return the number of epoch that passed since another epoch.

parameterDecorators.name: _epoch
parameterDecorators.description: Epoch to use as since epoch value.

returnDecorators.description: Number of epochs and current epoch.

functionDecorators.name: epochsSinceUpdate
functionDecorators.description: Return number of epochs passed since last epoch length update.

returnDecorators.description: The number of epoch that passed since last epoch length update.

functionDecorators.name: isCurrentEpochRun
functionDecorators.description: Return true if the current epoch has already run.

returnDecorators.description: Return true if current epoch is the last epoch that has run.

functionDecorators.name: runEpoch
functionDecorators.description: Perform state changes for the current epoch. Run a new epoch, should be called once at the start of any epoch.

functionDecorators.name: setController
functionDecorators.description: Set Controller. Only callable by current controller.

functionDecorators.name: setEpochLength
functionDecorators.description: Set epoch length to `_epochLength` blocks. Set the epoch length.
